config.name: Payplan - Firstdata
config.author: Morris Media Network
config.description: Firstdata allows access to the first data payment gateway.

param.name: store_name
param.label: Store Name
param.description: This is the ID of the store that was given to you by First Data. For example : 10123456789

param.name: shared_secret
param.label: Shared Secret
param.description: Shared secret as provided to you by first data

param.name: emails
param.label: Admins' Emails
param.description: Seperate emails with a ',' ex: andrew.zietlow@morris.com, chris.zietlow@morris.com

param.name: test
param.label: Test
param.description: Url staging linkpoint site for testing, or use the production site for actual transactions. Warning: there can be transaction fees from testing transactions on the production linkpoint site.
